Profiles Models¶

class profiles.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)¶

Create a user profile.

Parameters:

  • user (django.contrib.auth.models.User) – A reference to the associated django.contrib.auth.models.User instance.

  • favorite_city (str) – django.contrib.auth.models.User favorite city.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Profiles Views¶

profiles.views.index(request)¶

View to display a list of all models.Profile.

Parameters:

request (django.http.HttpRequest) – The HTTP request.

Returns:

Rendered HTML page displaying a list of all models.Profile.

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse

profiles.views.profile(request, username)¶

View to display an individual models.Profile.

Parameters:

  • request (django.http.HttpRequest) – The HTTP request.

  • username (str) – The username of the models.Profile to display.

Returns:

Rendered HTML page displaying the requested profile.

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse
